lines: You stand in the Skysteel Manufactory, chief producer of Ishgard's dragonslaying siege weaponry. Should you be interested in learning the machinist profession, pray direct your queries toward Lord Stephanivien.
Ah, our newest recruit. Was there aught with which I might aid you? Lord Stephanivien is best equipped to answer any questions you might have regarding machinists and machinistry.
Your battle against the dreaded Svara was the stuff of legends. Truly, 'tis the beginning of a new era.
Long have I labored at this post with no more effort than duty requires─but no more. Now I might hold my head high, and announce the name of our manufactory with pride.
The once-vibrant flower of House Haillenarte is much withered. Will machinistry be the miracle that helps it bloom anew...?
Welcome back, MistressMaster Forename. Word of your deeds continues to spread, and the manufactory is beset daily by a veritable legion of aspiring machinists!
